page.title: 15CHOIR AND CHOIR PRACTICE
page.content: Every Sunday I go to church and walk up into the choir stalls in front of the congregation. As soon as we are in the choir stalls we sing a hymn. We sometimes sing a psalm but not often. Then we listen to the readings. After the readings we have prayers and pray for other people in the world. After the service we have to put all the books away for Wednesday and Thursday when it is choir practice. On Wednesdays the junior choir have their practice and on Thursday the seniors have theirs. We have choir practice so that we know what we have to sing on Sunday. I like singing and enjoy being in the choir.
